document_data.name: Judarin
document_data.mainbody: '''Judarin''', also called '''the Sot''', was an [[elf|elven]] [[bard]]/[[sa'luk]] inhabiting [[Huzuz]], the City of Delights, in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Personality: Judarin was rude and lacked respect for authority and any organized religion.
document_data.Description: Judarin was a drunk who always appeared disheveled. His ''[[dolman]]'' was stained with wine.
document_data.Activities: He spent much of his time reciting poetry and verses detailing his agnostic beliefs and general lack of faith for the [[Zakharan pantheon|Enlightened gods]], an act for which he would probably be executed as a heretic if even taken before a ''[[Midani dictionary|qadi]]''. However, Judarin seemed doomed, or blessed, to forever remain surrounded by obscurity.
